name: Roots & Seek VR version.
description:
This game was developed with a Pico 4, I do not guarantee that it will work on Oculus / Meta Quest 2, etc.
Firstly, download the apk, than connect your VR headset to your PC.
Then, find the correct files to install the apk on the headset.
And drag & drop it. on your Pico 4. From the headset install the apk in the unknown heading.
